AGREEMENT FOR SALE AND PURCHASE:
Legally binding contract between a buyer and seller
Establishes terms and conditions for the sale of a property
Outlines the agreed purchase price and payment terms
Specifies the rights and obligations of both parties
Describes the property being sold, including its boundaries and any included fixtures
Addresses any conditions or contingencies, such as inspections or financing arrangements
Sets a timeline for the completion of the sale
Provides remedies and consequences for breach of contract
May include additional provisions, such as warranties or disclosures
Typically requires the buyer to pay a deposit as a show of good faith
Often a precursor to the transfer of ownership and the creation of a formal deed.

買賣協議書是買方和賣方之間的法律約束合同
確定財產買賣的條件和條款
規定了同意的購買價格和付款方式
明確規定了雙方的權利和義務
描述了正在出售的財產，包括其邊界和包含的裝置
處理任何條件或附帶條款，如檢查或融資安排
設定了完成交易的時間表
提供了違約合同的救濟和後果
可能包含其他條款，如保證或披露
通常要求買方支付訂金以示誠意
往往是所有權轉移和正式契約建立的前奏。
This type of document is a legally binding agreement that outlines the terms and conditions for the sale and purchase of a property.
這種文件是一份法律約束力的協議，概述了買賣房產的條款和條件。
AGREEMENT FOR SALE AND PURCHASE WITH PLA:
Document that outlines the terms and conditions of a property sale
Includes a plan that illustrates the boundaries and details of the property
Specifies the agreed-upon purchase price and payment arrangements
Sets out the rights and obligations of both the buyer and seller
Addresses any special conditions or additional clauses, such as inspections or financing arrangements
Establishes a timeline for completing the transaction
Provides remedies and consequences for breach of contract
May include additional provisions, such as warranties or disclosures
Often requires the buyer to pay a deposit as a sign of good faith
Serves as a precursor to the transfer of ownership and the formal contract establishment.

這份文件詳細說明了買賣房產的條款和條件。
包括了一份房產的平面圖，顯示了邊界和詳細資訊。
明確指定了買賣價格和付款安排。
規定了買方和賣方的權利和義務。
考慮到特殊條件或額外條款，例如檢查或融資安排。
設定了完成交易的時間表。
提供了違約條款和相應的後果。
可能包括其他規定，例如保證或披露事項。
通常要求買方支付定金作為誠信的表示。
作為所有權轉移和正式合約成立的先導文件。
This type of document is a legally binding agreement that outlines the terms and conditions for the sale and purchase of a property, along with an accompanying plan.
這類文件是一份具有法律約束力的協議，其中詳細列明了買賣房產的條件與細節，並附帶一份相應的平面圖。
AGREEMENT FOR SUBSALE AND PURCHASE:
An agreement used for the resale of a property between the existing buyer and a new buyer.
It outlines the terms and conditions of the resale transaction.
Specifies the purchase price and payment arrangements.
Includes details about the property, such as its location, size, and any fixtures or fittings.
States the rights and responsibilities of both the existing buyer (seller) and the new buyer.
May require the consent or approval of the original seller or relevant authorities.
Sets a timeline for the completion of the resale transaction.
Contains provisions for default and remedies in case of non-compliance.
Typically requires the new buyer to pay a deposit as a sign of commitment.
Serves as a legally binding contract to facilitate the transfer of ownership from the existing buyer to the new buyer.

一份在土地登記處下使用的協議，用於現有買方和新買方之間的重新銷售物業。
該協議概述了重新銷售交易的條款和條件。
具體說明了購買價格和付款安排。
包括有關物業的詳細信息，例如位置、大小和任何設備或裝修。
規定了現有買方（賣方）和新買方的權利和責任。
可能需要原賣方或相關機構的同意或批准。
設定了重新銷售交易完成的時間表。
包含對違約和救濟措施的規定。
通常要求新買方支付訂金作為承諾的標誌。
作為法律約束力的合同，促使所有權從現有買方轉移到新買方。
This type of document is a legally binding agreement that outlines the terms and conditions for the resale and purchase of a property.
這種文件是一份法律約定，用於規定房地產轉售和購買的條款和條件。
AGREEMENT FOR SUBSALE AND SUBPURCHASE:
A legal agreement used in the land registry for the resale and purchase of a property by a sub-buyer.
It outlines the terms and conditions of the resale transaction between the existing buyer (sub-seller) and the sub-buyer.
Specifies the purchase price and payment arrangements.
Includes detailed information about the property, such as location, size, and any fixtures or renovations.
Establishes the rights and responsibilities of the existing buyer (sub-seller) and the sub-buyer.
May require consent or approval from the original seller or relevant authorities.
Sets a timeline for the completion of the sub-sale transaction.
Contains provisions for default and remedies.
Typically requires the sub-buyer to pay a deposit as a sign of commitment.
Acts as a legally binding contract that facilitates the transfer of ownership from the existing buyer to the sub-buyer.

土地註冊局使用的法律協議，用於轉售和購買物業的次買家。
該協議概述了現有買家（次賣家）和次買家之間的轉售交易的條款和條件。
指定了購買價格和支付安排。
包含有關物業的詳細信息，例如位置、大小和任何設施或翻修。
確定現有買家（次賣家）和次買家的權利和責任。
可能需要原始賣家或相關機構的同意或批准。
設定完成次轉售交易的時間表。
包含違約和救濟的條款。
通常要求次買家支付訂金作為承諾的象徵。
充當具有法律約束力的合同，促成現有買家將所有權轉讓給次買家。
This type of document is a legal agreement that outlines the terms and conditions for the resale and subsequent purchase of a property.
這種文件是一份法律協議，概述了轉售和後續購買房產的條款和條件。
APPROVAL LETTER:
Document issued by the land registry granting approval for a specific action or request related to a property.
Confirms that the requested action meets the requirements and regulations set by the land registry.
Provides authorization for activities such as property development, subdivision, or alteration.
Contains details about the approved plans, including any conditions or restrictions.
May specify a timeframe within which the approved action must be completed.
Serves as official documentation of the land registry's consent for the proposed activity.
Can be used as evidence of compliance with land registry regulations.
May require the submission of supporting documents or fees before issuance.
Typically includes the name of the applicant and property details.
Enables the applicant to proceed with the approved action with the assurance of legal compliance.

土地註冊發出的文件，核准有關財產的特定行動或請求。
確認所要求的行動符合土地註冊設定的要求和規定。
授權進行財產開發、分割或改建等活動。
包含有關核准計劃的細節，包括任何條件或限制。
可能規定核准的行動必須在一定時間內完成。
作為土地註冊機構對所提議活動的正式許可文件。
可作為遵守土地註冊規定的證據。
可能要求在發出前提交支持文件或支付費用。
通常包括申請人的姓名和財產詳細信息。
讓申請人能夠在確保合法遵循的情況下進行核准的行動。
This type of document is an official letter issued by a relevant authority to grant approval or permission for a specific action or request related to the property.
這種文件是由相關機構發出的正式信函，用於核准或允許與該房產相關的特定行動或請求。
ASSENT:
A legal document used to transfer the ownership of a property from a deceased owner to their heirs or beneficiaries.
Confirms the consent or agreement of the beneficiaries to the transfer of the property.
Requires the signature of all the beneficiaries mentioned in the deceased owner's will.
Establishes the legal basis for the transfer of property rights.
Provides evidence that the beneficiaries have agreed to the distribution of the deceased owner's assets.
Typically includes details such as the names of the beneficiaries, the description of the property, and the date of the transfer.
May require additional supporting documents, such as the deceased owner's death certificate and probate documents.
Enables the beneficiaries to assume legal ownership and control over the property.
Essential for ensuring a smooth and lawful transfer of property rights in accordance with the deceased owner's wishes.

一份法律文件，用於將房產所有權從已故擁有人轉移給其繼承人或受益人。
確認繼承人對財產轉移的同意或協議。
要求已故擁有人遺囑中提及的所有繼承人簽字。
建立財產權轉移的法律依據。
提供繼承人同意分配已故擁有人資產的證據。
通常包括繼承人的姓名、房產描述和轉移日期等詳細信息。
可能需要其他支持文件，如已故擁有人的死亡證明和遺囑執行文件。
使繼承人能夠依法獲得房產的所有權和控制權。
對確保根據已故擁有人的意願順利且合法地轉移財產權至關重要。
This type of document is a legal approval or agreement given by a person with an interest in the property, typically for a transfer or mortgage.
這類文件是由對該物業具有利益的人給予的法律批准或協議，通常用於財產轉移或抵押。
ASSIGNMENT:
A legal document used to transfer the ownership or interest in a property from one party to another.
It involves the transfer of rights, obligations, and benefits associated with the property.
Typically used when selling, transferring, or assigning a leasehold or leasehold interest in a property.
Specifies the details of the transfer, including the parties involved, property description, and terms of the assignment.
Creates a legal record of the transfer of ownership or interest in the property.
May require the consent or approval of relevant parties, such as landlords or governing authorities.
Provides evidence of the transfer and serves as a binding agreement between the parties involved.
Ensures that the new owner or assignee assumes all responsibilities and rights associated with the property.
Important for establishing a clear chain of ownership and protecting the rights of the parties involved.

一份法律文件，用於將財產的所有權或利益從一方轉讓給另一方。
在出售、轉讓或分配租賃或租賃利益時通常使用。
指定了轉讓的詳細信息，包括相關方、財產描述和轉讓條款。
創建了財產所有權或利益轉讓的法律記錄。
可能需要相關方（如房東或管理機構）的同意或批准。
提供轉讓的證據，並作為相關方之間的約束協議。
確保新業主或受讓人承擔財產相關的所有責任和權益。
對於建立清晰的所有權鏈和保護相關方權益至關重要。
This type of document is a legal transfer of rights or interests in a property from one party to another. It typically involves the transfer of ownership or a lease agreement.
這類文件是一份法律上的權益轉讓，將財產的權利或利益從一方轉移給另一方。通常涉及所有權的轉讓或租賃協議。
ASSIGNMENT OF RENTAL:
A legal document used to transfer the right to collect rental income from one party to another.
Typically used when a property owner assigns their right to receive rental payments to another party.
Specifies the details of the assignment, including the parties involved, property information, and assignment terms.
Creates a legal record of the transfer of rental rights.
Requires the consent or approval of the relevant parties involved, such as tenants or property management.
Provides evidence of the assignment and serves as a binding agreement between the parties.
Ensures that the new assignee assumes the responsibilities and benefits associated with rental income.
Important for establishing a clear chain of rental rights and protecting the interests of all parties involved.

一份法律文件，用於將收取租金的權利從一方轉讓給另一方。
通常在物業所有者將其收取租金的權利轉讓給其他人時使用。
指定了轉讓的詳細信息，包括相關方的身份、物業信息和轉讓條款。
創建了轉讓租金權利的法律紀錄。
需要相關方的同意或批准，例如租戶或物業管理方。
提供了轉讓的證據，並作為各方之間的約束協議。
確保新的受讓人承擔與租金收入相關的責任和利益。
對於建立清晰的租金權利鏈和保護所有相關方的利益至關重要。
This type of document is an agreement that transfers the right to receive rental income from one party to another. It typically involves the assignment of lease or rental rights.
這類文件是一份協議，將收取租金的權利從一方轉讓給另一方。通常涉及租賃權利的轉讓。
ASSIGNMENT WITH PLAN:
A legal document that transfers the rights and interests in a property from one party to another, along with a detailed plan or diagram.
Typically used when there is a need to transfer not only the ownership but also specific boundaries or spatial details of the property.
Includes a description of the property, such as its location, dimensions, and any relevant features.
The plan or diagram visually represents the boundaries, structures, and other important elements of the property.
Provides a clear and visual representation of the property being transferred.
Helps to ensure accuracy and clarity in defining the rights and interests being transferred.
Establishes a legal record of the transfer and helps to protect the rights of all parties involved.
Can be used as evidence in case of any disputes or discrepancies regarding the property boundaries or details.

這是一份法律文件，將一方對一個財產的權益轉讓給另一方，並附上詳細的平面圖或示意圖。
在需要轉讓不僅所有權，還包括財產的具體邊界或空間細節時通常使用。
包括財產的描述，如位置、尺寸和其他相關特徵。
平面圖或示意圖直觀地呈現了財產的邊界、結構和其他重要元素。
提供了財產轉讓的清晰和視覺化呈現。
有助於確保轉讓的權益定義準確和清晰。
建立了轉讓的法律記錄，有助於保護所有相關方的權益。
在涉及財產邊界或詳細信息的任何爭議或差異情況下，可作為證據使用。
This type of document is an agreement that transfers the rights or interests in a property, along with a plan indicating the specific details of the assigned property.
這種文件是一份協議，將財產的權益轉讓給他人，並附帶一份指示具體詳情的計劃。
CANCELLATION AGREEMENT:
A Cancellation Agreement is a legal document used to terminate or cancel an existing agreement related to a property.
It is typically executed when both parties mutually agree to end the contractual obligations.
The agreement outlines the terms and conditions for the cancellation, including any penalties or fees involved.
It serves as evidence of the parties' intent to terminate the original agreement and release each other from any further obligations.
The Cancellation Agreement may specify the reasons for cancellation, such as a breach of contract or a change in circumstances.
It provides a formal record of the agreement to cancel, ensuring clarity and legal protection for both parties.
The agreement may require the return of any property, documents, or funds exchanged under the original agreement.
It helps resolve disputes and prevents future legal complications by documenting the termination of the previous agreement.

解約協議是一份法律文件，用於終止或取消與房地產相關的現有協議。
當雙方共同同意結束合約義務時，通常會執行此協議。
該協議概述了解約的條款和條件，包括任何相關的罰款或費用。
它作為雙方終止原始協議並解除彼此進一步義務的意圖的證據。
解約協議可能會指定解約的原因，例如合約違約或情況變更。
它提供了一份正式的紀錄，證明了解約的協議，確保雙方的清晰性和法律保護。
該協議可能要求將在原始協議下交換的任何財產、文件或資金退還。
通過記錄先前協議的終止，解約協議有助於解決爭議並防止未來的法律問題。
This type of document is an agreement that terminates or cancels a previous contract or agreement related to the property.
這類文件是一份終止或取消與該物業相關的先前合約或協議的協議書。
CARBON COPY OF PRELIMINARY SALE AND PURC:
A carbon copy of the preliminary sale and purchase agreement is a duplicate copy of the original agreement made using carbon paper.
It serves as a replica of the original agreement, containing the same terms and conditions.
The carbon copy is created simultaneously with the original agreement to provide an additional record of the transaction.
It is commonly used for administrative purposes and record-keeping in the land registry.
The carbon copy retains the same legal validity as the original agreement.
It can be used as evidence of the parties' intentions and commitments in the sale and purchase transaction.
The carbon copy helps ensure transparency and accuracy in maintaining documentation related to land transactions.
It may be used for reference or verification in case of disputes or future legal matters.

預售合約的複製本是使用複寫紙製作的原合約的副本。
它作為原合約的複製品，包含相同的條款和條件。
複製本與原合約同時生成，用於提供交易的額外記錄。
它通常用於土地登記處的行政目的和文件保存。
複製本與原合約具有相同的法律效力。
它可作為交易雙方意圖和承諾的證據。
複製本有助於確保土地交易相關文件的透明度和準確性。
在爭議或未來的法律事務中，它可用於參考或驗證之用。
This type of document is a duplicate copy of the preliminary sale and purchase agreement that has been registered with the land registry.
這種文件是已在土地註冊處登記的預售合約的副本。
CARBON COPY OF PROVISIONAL AGREEMENT FOR:
A carbon copy of a provisional agreement for sale and purchase is a duplicate of the original agreement created using carbon paper.
It serves as a replica of the original agreement, containing the same terms and conditions.
The carbon copy is generated simultaneously with the original agreement and is used as an additional record of the transaction.
It is commonly used for administrative purposes and document preservation at the land registry.
The carbon copy holds the same legal validity as the original agreement.
It serves as evidence of the intentions and commitments of both parties involved in the transaction.
The carbon copy helps ensure transparency and accuracy of the related documents in land transactions.
In disputes or future legal matters, it can be referenced or verified as necessary.

初步買賣合約複寫本是使用複寫紙製作的原始合約的副本。
它作為原始合約的複製品，包含相同的條款和條件。
複寫本與原始合約同時生成，用於作為交易的附加記錄。
它通常用於土地登記處的行政目的和文件保存。
複寫本具有與原始合約相同的法律效力。
它作為證明交易雙方意圖和承諾的證據。
複寫本有助於確保土地交易相關文件的透明度和準確性。
在爭議或未來的法律事務中，可以根據需要參考或驗證複寫本。
This type of document refers to a registered duplicate of a provisional agreement for the sale and purchase of a property.
這種文件是指已註冊的臨時買賣協議的副本。
CERTIFICATE OF COMPLIANCE:
A Certificate of Compliance is a document issued by the land registry to confirm that certain requirements or regulations have been met.
It serves as proof that the property or development complies with specific rules and standards set by the relevant authorities.
The certificate may include details about building codes, zoning regulations, environmental standards, or other legal requirements.
It is typically obtained after an inspection or review process to ensure compliance with the applicable laws and regulations.
The certificate provides assurance to buyers, sellers, and other parties that the property meets the necessary criteria.
It may be required during property transactions, such as when applying for a mortgage or transferring ownership.
The certificate helps to ensure transparency and accountability in land transactions by verifying compliance with regulatory obligations.
It serves as an official record of compliance that can be referenced or reviewed when needed, such as for legal purposes or future property transactions.

合規證書是土地登記處發行的文件，用於確認特定要求或法規已經符合。
它作為證明該物業或開發項目符合相關當局制定的特定規則和標準的證據。
該證書可能包含有關建築法規、分區規定、環境標準或其他法定要求的詳細信息。
通常在檢查或審查過程中獲得，以確保符合適用的法律和法規。
該證書為買家、賣家和其他相關方提供保證，證明該物業符合必要的標準。
在物業交易中可能需要這個證書，例如申請抵押貸款或財產所有權轉移時。
該證書有助於確保土地交易的透明度和問責制，以驗證符合法規義務。
它作為符合規定的官方記錄，可以在需要時作為參考或審查，例如用於法律目的或未來的財產交易。
This type of document is a registered certification indicating that the property complies with specific regulations, standards, or requirements.
這種文件是一份已登記的證明書，表明該物業符合特定的法規、標準或要求。
CERTIFICATE OF EXEMPTION FROM ESTATE DUT:
Certificate of Exemption from Estate Duty is a document issued by the land registry to declare that a property is exempt from estate duty.
It serves as proof that the property is not subject to the payment of estate duty upon the death of the owner.
This certificate is obtained when the property meets certain criteria or conditions that exempt it from estate duty.
It may require the submission of relevant documents or evidence to support the exemption claim.
The certificate provides legal assurance and confirmation that the property is exempt from the financial obligations associated with estate duty.
It is important for individuals involved in estate planning, inheritance, or property transfers to obtain this certificate to establish the exempt status of the property.
This document helps simplify the process of property transfer and ensures compliance with applicable laws and regulations related to estate duty.
The certificate can be presented as evidence or documentation in legal proceedings or for administrative purposes relating to the property's exempt status.

豁免遺產稅證書是由土地註冊處發出的文件，宣布一項財產不需要支付遺產稅。
該證書作為證明，證明該財產在所有者去世時不需要支付遺產稅。
當該財產滿足一定的條件或條款以免除遺產稅時，才能獲得此證書。
可能需要提交相關文件或證據來支持豁免申請。
該證書提供法律保證和確認，證明該財產免除與遺產稅相關的財務義務。
對於從事資產規劃、遺產分配或財產轉讓的個人而言，獲得此證書以確定財產的免稅狀態非常重要。
此文件有助於簡化財產轉移流程，確保符合與遺產稅相關的適用法律和法規。
該證書可以作為證據或文件，在涉及該財產免稅狀態的法律訴訟或行政程序中提交使用。
This type of Document is a registered certificate that indicates an exemption from paying estate duty for the property. It signifies that the property is not subject to estate tax.

A Deed of Assent is a legal document that facilitates the transfer of property ownership after the death of the registered owner.
